snippet: Late in the Super Bowl, on the Patriots' final drive, the Giants were called for having 12 men on the field. It was good strategy, although almost certainly unintentional.
abstract: Late in the Super Bowl, on the Patriots' final drive, the Giants were called for having 12 men on the field. It was good strategy, although almost certainly unintentional.
lead_paragraph: Late in the Super Bowl, on the Patriots' final drive, the Giants were called for having 12 men on the field.

headline.main: Solution Needed for 12 Defenders on the Field
